38 struct AppCocoaTouchState;
39 
40 enum InterfaceOrientation {
41  Unknown = 0,
42  Portrait = 1 << 0,
43  PortraitUpsideDown = 1 << 1,
44  LandscapeLeft = 1 << 2,
45  LandscapeRight = 1 << 3,
46  PortraitAll = (Portrait | PortraitUpsideDown),
47  LandscapeAll = (LandscapeLeft | LandscapeRight),
48  All = (PortraitAll | LandscapeAll)
49 };
50

181  // These are called by application instantation macros and are only used in the launch process
182  static void prepareLaunch() { App::prepareLaunch(); }
183  static void executeLaunch( AppCocoaTouch *app, RendererRef renderer, const char *title, int argc, char * const argv[] ) { App::sInstance = sInstance = app; App::executeLaunch( app, renderer, title, argc, argv ); }

221 #define CINDER_APP_COCOA_TOUCH( APP, RENDERER ) \
222 int main( int argc, char *argv[] ) { \
223  cinder::app::AppCocoaTouch::prepareLaunch(); \
224  cinder::app::AppCocoaTouch *app = new APP; \
225  cinder::app::RendererRef ren( new RENDERER ); \
226  cinder::app::AppCocoaTouch::executeLaunch( app, ren, #APP, argc, argv );\
227  cinder::app::AppCocoaTouch::cleanupLaunch(); \
228  return 0; \
229 }
